data.title: swiftbat_python
data.name: swiftbat_python
data.description: Utilities for BAT instrument on the Neil Gehrels Swift Observatory satellite

evidence: "Swiftbat is a set of Python library routines and command-line utilities that have been developed for the purpose of retrieving, analyzing, and displaying data from NASA's Swift spacecraft"
"If you want to find the exposure of BAT to a point in the FOV, use `swiftbat.batExposure(theta, phi)`"

"This package also installs a command-line program 'swinfo' that tells you Swift Information such as what the MET (onboard-clock) time is, where Swift was pointing, and whether a specific source was above the horizon and/or in the field of view."
